query:
SELECT 
  'TOTAL EXPENSES' as Metric,
  ROUND(SUM(amount), 2) as Amount
FROM expenses
UNION ALL
SELECT 
  'TOTAL REVENUE' as Metric,
  ROUND(SUM(amount), 2) as Amount
FROM revenue
UNION ALL
SELECT 
  'NET PROFIT' as Metric,
  ROUND((SELECT COALESCE(SUM(amount), 0) FROM revenue) - (SELECT COALESCE(SUM(amount), 0) FROM expenses), 2) as Amount;
